joint_involvement.justification: 2-10 large joints: multiple large joints involved (shoulders, elbows)

serology.justification: RF positive and anti-CCP negative, leading to 2 points out of max 3

treatment_context.justification: Presence of DMARD (bDMARD) strongly suggests established RA

classification_rationale: The patient has multiple large joints involved, with a serology score of 2 (high positive RF and negative anti-CCP), and strong evidence from the presence of a DMARD. The acute phase reactant CRP is normal.
